original: Bengtson, Karl Åke, praktiserande läkare, Borås, f. 27/4/07 i Vingåker, Södermani. 1., av verkmäst. C. Th. B. o. Ida Sofia Ljungqvist. G. 40 m. Ester Brundin. Barn: Eva Marianne f. 44. — Stud:ex. 26, med. kand. 30 o. med. Hc. 36, alit i Upps. Assist :läk. v. Söderköp. las. 36-37, därund. und:läk. v. Mössebergs vintersanat. o. vatten-kuranst. 37-40, kort. förordn. å Maria o. Sabbatsb. sjukh. i Sthlm 41, prakt, läk. i Borås sed. 42.
translated: Bengtson, Karl Åke, practicing physician, Borås, b. April 27th, 1907 in Vingåker, Södermani. 1st child of foreman C. Th. B. and Ida Sofia Ljungqvist. Married in 1940 to Ester Brundin. Children: Eva Marianne b. 1944. Education: high school graduate 1926, medical degree 1930, medical practicing license 1936, all from Uppsala. Assistant physician at Söderköping Hospital 1936-1937, then resident physician at Mösseberg Winter Sanatorium and Water Cure 1937-1940, briefly worked at Maria and Sabbatsberg Hospitals in Stockholm in 1941 before becoming a practicing physician in Borås from 1942 onwards.

workLocation.name: Mösseberg Winter Sanatorium and Water Cure
